name: Tropical Smoothie
description: Vacation vibes with mango, pineapple, and coconut. Refreshing and invigorating.

instructions.instruction: Cut mango in half, remove pit, peel and cube.
instructions.tip: Ripe mango is sweet and creamy.

instructions.instruction: Pour in coconut milk and orange juice.
Blend on high 1-2 minutes until completely smooth.
Check consistency. Add more orange juice if too thick.
Pour into tall glasses. Sprinkle shredded coconut on top.
instructions.tip: Garnish with pineapple or mango slice.

tips: Mango is rich in vitamin A and vitamin C.
Perfect cold drink for hot summer days.
Can use frozen tropical fruit mix.
storageInfo: Best fresh. Can refrigerate 24 hours max.
servingSuggestion: Serve at beach parties, summer breakfasts, or as dessert substitute.
variations: Protein boost: Add vanilla protein powder.
Spicy kick: Add 1 piece fresh ginger - anti-inflammatory.
